article: the united states federal aviation administration 's -lrb- faa -rrb- announcement last saturday to downgrade south korean air safety rating from `` category i '' to `` category ii '' is ailing the country 's two commercial airlines -- asiana airlines and korean air .
abstract: faa 's downgrading air safety ails s. korean airlines
